TopicTitle: How to disable the yellow-green OSDs?

Articles.Content:
Each time i pause the game it switches the interface back - i.e. menus, staging et cetera.

Then it puts this yellow-greenish text saying something useless like "Time warp is 1x, Aerodynamic forces overlay is disabled"

 

Tell please if there is any way to completely rid off of these OSDs ?
You can hit F2, or get a mod to hide the green text when you press F2. Aside from that, I'm sorry, no, there isn't anything.

Oh wait... someone just hooked me up with the mod for this yesterday!  And it works great!
The links are in his response to me asking the same question.  Remember to send him some love!!!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/127785-the-tale-of-emiko-station-chapter-22-added-and-some-answers-at-last/&do=findComment&comment=2365610

Just Jim, oh, thank you!

 

It spoiled a lot of screenshots and drove me virtually crazy 8)

 

And the mod source, in fact, is only thirty five lines long.
